mapper.select: select material_procurement_plan.*, product.product_name, product.product_code, production_planning.product_cnt, material.material_code, material.material_name, material_resource_plan.mstorage_no, material_storage.mstorage_code, material_storage.mstorage_stock, material_resource_plan.mrp_leadtime from material_procurement_plan join production_planning on material_procurement_plan.prpl_no = production_planning.prpl_no join product on production_planning.product_no = product.product_no join material_resource_plan on material_procurement_plan.mrp_no = material_resource_plan.mrp_no join material on material_resource_plan.material_no = material.material_no join material_storage on material_resource_plan.mstorage_no = material_storage.mstorage_no

select material_procurement_plan.*, product.product_name, product.product_code, production_planning.product_cnt,
material.material_code, material.material_name,
material_storage.mstorage_code, material_storage.mstorage_stock,
material_resource_plan.mstorage_no, material_resource_plan.mrp_leadtime, material_resource_plan.mrp_due_date,
employee.emp_name, employee.emp_phone, employee.emp_email
from material_procurement_plan join production_planning on material_procurement_plan.prpl_no = production_planning.prpl_no join product on production_planning.product_no = product.product_no join material_resource_plan on material_procurement_plan.mrp_no = material_resource_plan.mrp_no join material on material_resource_plan.material_no = material.material_no join material_storage on material_resource_plan.mstorage_no = material_storage.mstorage_no JOIN employee ON material_procurement_plan.emp_no = employee.emp_no where mpp_no=#{mppNo}
mapper.insert: insert into material_procurement_plan(mpp_code, mpp_reg_date, mpp_ver, mpp_file, prpl_no, mrp_no, emp_no, mpp_etc) values(#{mppCode}, #{mppRegDate}, #{mppVer}, #{mppFile}, #{prplNo}, #{mrpNo}, #{empNo}, #{mppEtc})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM material_procurement_plan WHERE DATE_FORMAT('now()', '%Y%m%d') = #{todayDate}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM material_procurement_plan WHERE mpp_code = #{mppCode}
SELECT prpl_no FROM production_planning WHERE product_no = #{productNo} ORDER BY prpl_no DESC LIMIT 1
select company.* from employee join company on employee.comp_no = company.comp_no WHERE emp_no = #{empNo}
